channel.title: Comments on: Visual Studio 2008 Explorer and Designers Package fails to load

item.title: By: dudu
item.dc:creator: dudu
item.description:
Exactly the problem I have. Thanks!
You can uninstall Source Analyst or install the newer version of it (ver 4.3) to fix the problem
item.content:encoded:
Exactly the problem I have. Thanks!

You can uninstall Source Analyst or install the newer version of it (ver 4.3) to fix the problem

item.content:encoded: thanks for blogging this, saved me a reinstall :-)

item.title: By: Bo Lund
item.dc:creator: Bo Lund
item.description: Actually, this error mesage could be coming from from any VS extension package - not just Stylecop. But in the case of Stylecop (Sopurce Analysis) version 4.2 it could create this problem. We have fixed it in the soon to be release version 4.3.
item.content:encoded: Actually, this error mesage could be coming from from any VS extension package – not just Stylecop. But in the case of Stylecop (Sopurce Analysis) version 4.2 it could create this problem. We have fixed it in the soon to be release version 4.3.
